verses.roman:
nandivardhanas tat-putraḥ
pañca pradyotanā ime
aṣṭa-triṁśottara-śataṁ
bhokṣyanti pṛthivīṁ nṛpāḥ

synonyms: nandivardhanaḥ—Nandivardhana; tat-putraḥ—his son; pañca—five; pradyotanāḥ—Pradyotanas; ime—these; aṣṭa-triṁśa—thirty-eight; uttara—increased by; śatam—one hundred; bhokṣyanti—they will enjoy; pṛthivīm—the earth; nṛpāḥ—these kings.
translation: The son of Rājaka will be Nandivardhana, and thus in the Pradyotana dynasty there will be five kings, who will enjoy the earth for 138 years.
